name: Joy Virtue II
description:
A short 2 player game made for the Duplicade 2015 Game Jam.

This is a retro, NES bootleg style game, a parody. No real copyright infringement is intended.

Controls

Player 1

  • W - shoot up
  • A - move left
  • S - shoot down
  • D - move right
  • Space - flap

Player 2

  • Up Arrow - shoot up
  • Left Arrow - move left
  • Down Arrow - shoot down
  • Right Arrow - move right
  • Enter - flap

When the game ends the app will automatically close (because of the duplicade rules).
